verses.verse: For the Chief Musician. Maschil of the sons of Korah. As the <S%H354>hart<s%> <S%H6165>panteth<s%> after the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H650>brooks<s%>, So <S%H6165>panteth<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> after <S%H430>thee<s%>, O God.

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsteth<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%>, for the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>: When shall I <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>?
My <S%H1832>tears<s%> have been my <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, While they <S%H3117>continually<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, Where is thy God?

These things I <S%H2142>remember<s%>, and pour <S%H8210>out<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> within <S%H5674>me<s%>, How I went with the <S%H5519>throng<s%>, and <S%H1718>led<s%> them to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, With the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> and <S%H8426>praise<s%>, a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> keeping <S%H2287>holyday<s%>.

Why art thou cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? And why art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> within <S%H3176>me<s%>? Hope thou in <S%H430>God<s%>; for I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> him For the <S%H3444>help<s%> of his <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.

O my <S%H430>God<s%>, my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is cast <S%H7817>down<s%> within <S%H2142>me<s%>: Therefore do I remember thee from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, And the <S%H2769>Hermons<s%>, from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H4706>Mizar<s%>.

Deep <S%H8415><s%> <S%H7121>calleth<s%> unto <S%H8415>deep<s%> at the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of thy <S%H6794>waterfalls<s%>: All thy <S%H4867>waves<s%> and thy <S%H1530>billows<s%> are gone over <S%H5674>me<s%>.

Yet <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H6680>command<s%> his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H3119>day-time<s%>; And in the <S%H3915>night<s%> his <S%H7892>song<s%> shall be with <S%H8605>me<s%>, Even a prayer unto the <S%H410>God<s%> of my <S%H2416>life<s%>.

I will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%> my <S%H5553>rock<s%>, Why hast thou <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> <S%H3212>me<s%>? Why go I <S%H6937>mourning<s%> because of the <S%H3906>oppression<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>?

As with a <S%H7524>sword<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, mine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> <S%H2778>reproach<s%> <S%H3117>me<s%>, While they continually <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, Where is thy God?

Why art thou cast <S%H7817>down<s%>, O my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? And why art thou <S%H1993>disquieted<s%> within <S%H3176>me<s%>? Hope thou in <S%H430>God<s%>; For I shall yet <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H3444>him<s%>, Who is the help of my <S%H6440>countenance<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>.
